thread.title: 4 indicted in million-dollar Bellagio craps scheme
thread.title_full: 4 indicted in million-dollar Bellagio craps scheme

title: 4 indicted in million-dollar Bellagio craps scheme
text:
Published By: Las Vegas Review-Journal - Today 
For nearly two years, a pair of Bellagio craps dealers and two friends stole more than $1 million of the tables, prosecutors said Wednesday....
